actions.text: On agreeing to the Poe (TX) amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Poe (TX).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Poe (TX) amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: An amendment numbered 7 printed in House Report 113-465 to require the DNI to submit to the appropriate committees of Congress a comprehensive strategy to disrupt, dismantle, and defeat al-Qaeda, its affiliated groups, associated groups, and adherents. The amendment also requests that the report include the Administration's definitions of al-Qaeda core, affiliated groups, associated groups, and adherents.
purpose: Amendment requires the Director of National Intelligence to submit to the appropriate committees of Congress a comprehensive strategy to disrupt, dismantle, and defeat al-Qaeda, its affiliated groups, associated groups, and adherents. Amendment also requests that the report include the Administration's definitions of al-Qaeda core, affiliated groups, associated groups, and adherents.
